descriptionSet.description: Diocese of Innsbruck. Current Order house. Founded as a daughter house of the abbey at Roth.
Saint Chapter Houses; Altars; Retables; Martyrs

subjectSet.display: Hll. Laurentius und Stephanus (S. Laurence; S. Stephen)

titleSet.display: Chapter House. Interior view of a longitudinal room with a central colonnade. The ceiling is vaulted with sexpartite lierne vaults. Against the far wall is an altar with retable.
